pageContext.description: In perfect condition except for a slight hammering of the butt. stop-ridge exceptionally developed: it protrudes 6mm on each face of blade.
pageContext.other: Width: edge 45mm; ridge 27mm; above ridge 24mm; butt 26mm,Thickness: ridge 36mm; below ridge 24mm; septum 15mm at ridge,Weight: 425.7 gms
pageContext.collection: University College, Aberystwyth,Arts and Crafts Gallery (1928)
pageContext.site: wales,ceredigion (formerly cardiganshire),llandre (formerly llanfihangel genaur glynn) parish,tirymynach township,tom - y - bwlch farm,found in 1880 by the late richard morris
